ygData.msgSnippet: Ah. How did you know I was on the Rathe? :-) Seriously though thanks for the tip. While I at times love mindless easy XP it got old after the first couple of
ygData.messageBody:
Ah. How did you know I was on the Rathe? :-)

Seriously though thanks for the tip. While I at times love mindless easy XP it
got old after the first couple of mobs. :-)

-Ranian
